function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unknown variability in SARS-CoV-2 viral shedding rates between people and within people at different stages of infection.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of community SARS-CoV-2 infection, leading to ineffective control measures.","Mitigation":"Implementing a combination of wastewater monitoring and individual testing to account for variability.","Technologies":"Wastewater monitoring technology and individual testing kits.","People":"Public health officials, facility operators.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies."},{"Description":"Potential for inaccurate detection of SARS-CoV-2 re-emergence or presence/absence through wastewater monitoring.","Impact":"Misinformed policy responses and delayed or premature relaxation of restrictions.","Mitigation":"Developing robust validation methods and cross-referencing with clinical data for confirmation.","Technologies":"Validation methods for wastewater monitoring and data cross-referencing.","People":"Public health officials, policy makers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of widely-accepted surveillance system for detecting the potential community presence of COVID-19 through wastewater monitoring.","Impact":"Inability to effectively utilize wastewater-based epidemiology for informing policy responses and management.","Mitigation":"Standardizing surveillance protocols, data analysis, and reporting mechanisms.","Technologies":"Standardized surveillance and data analysis protocols.","People":"Public health officials, facility operators, policymakers.","Owner":"Health agencies, international health organizations."}]}
